author: Sp500Fed
content: Deregulation will be positive across the board , however, shadow banning Trump searches on google and also hiding the recent Trump Joe Rogan podcast on youtube will have some awfull blowback on aphabet.

author: Ponzescheme
content: Bullish: Gotta like the weekly chart on GOOG shares. This week we got a MACD cross above the 0 line, very positive and would indicate that this has a lot of legs in it on the upside.
